query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS optimization_scenarios (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  projectId INT NOT NULL,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  budgetConstraint DECIMAL(15,2),
  budgetType ENUM('hard','soft') DEFAULT 'hard',
  timeHorizon INT NOT NULL,
  discountRate DECIMAL(5,4) DEFAULT 0.0300,
  optimizationGoal ENUM('minimize_cost','maximize_ci','maximize_roi','minimize_risk') DEFAULT 'maximize_roi',
  totalCost DECIMAL(15,2),
  totalBenefit DECIMAL(15,2),
  netPresentValue DECIMAL(15,2),
  returnOnInvestment DECIMAL(5,2),
  paybackPeriod DECIMAL(5,1),
  currentCI DECIMAL(5,2),
  projectedCI DECIMAL(5,2),
  ciImprovement DECIMAL(5,2),
  currentFCI DECIMAL(5,4),
  projectedFCI DECIMAL(5,4),
  fciImprovement DECIMAL(5,4),
  currentRiskScore DECIMAL(5,2),
  projectedRiskScore DECIMAL(5,2),
  riskReduction DECIMAL(5,2),
  status ENUM('draft','optimized','approved','implemented') DEFAULT 'draft',
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2g8chP3aro94bni.root --database XnmtZZwX6e46H8JVZbq4Ta --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS optimization_scenarios (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,

  totalCost DECIMAL(15,2),
  totalBenefit DECIMAL(15,2),
  netPresentValue DECIMAL(15,2),
  returnOnInvestment DECIMAL(5,2),
  paybackPeriod DECIMAL(5,1),
  currentCI DECIMAL(5,2),
  projectedCI DECIMAL(5,2),
  ciImprovement DECIMAL(5,2),
  currentFCI DECIMAL(5,4),
  projectedFCI DECIMAL(5,4),
  fciImprovement DECIMAL(5,4),
  currentRiskScore DECIMAL(5,2),
  projectedRiskScore DECIMAL(5,2),
  riskReduction DECIMAL(5,2),
  status ENUM('draft','optimized','approved','implemented') DEFAULT 'draft',
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
